solution_line_template: Rene finished {rene_pages_per_60_min} x {time_multiplier} = <<{rene_pages_per_60_min}*{time_multiplier}={rene_total_pages}>>{rene_total_pages} pages in {total_reading_minutes} minutes.
Lulu finished {lulu_pages_per_60_min} x {time_multiplier} = <<{lulu_pages_per_60_min}*{time_multiplier}={lulu_total_pages}>>{lulu_total_pages} pages in {total_reading_minutes} minutes.
Cherry finished {cherry_pages_per_60_min} x {time_multiplier} = <<{cherry_pages_per_60_min}*{time_multiplier}={cherry_total_pages}>>{cherry_total_pages} pages in {total_reading_minutes} minutes.
Therefore they have finished a total of {rene_total_pages} + {lulu_total_pages} + {cherry_total_pages} = {total_pages_finished} pages in {total_reading_minutes} minutes.
